name: SEER Regional Nodes
title: SEER Regional Nodes
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field. Distant lymph nodes are coded in SEER METS.

**Note 2:**  Periaortic and pericaval lymph nodes are classified as regional nodes. They are now coded in SEER Regional Lymph Nodes.
footnotes:
\###Considered distant in Historic stage
\***Considered distant in 1977 Summary Staging Guide
